post.text: WOW! Join me in Daytona Beach, Florida for a few minutes - with the #TrumpTrain! WE will MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: John
comment.text: I would like that you talk a little bit more with respect. Please get an adviser to do your speeches I am voting for you but need to hear you respect more in order to back you up with the opposers. You might do good things but ruin it with your mouth and that is what people care. I don't I like actions please show us a little bit more class when talking sorry

replies.author: Kelly
replies.text: Yes stay home under the bed and don't say anything we will vote you in but please stop opening your mouth. Cause I'm scare other republican might start thinking you're stupid and they might vote Clinton. Remember we gotta make America white again,,, I mean great again!!! ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜³

replies.author: Melanie
replies.text: I have never had to ask my Presidental candidates to do as you ask. You act like you are talking to a child. Maybe because you are.
